Detailed Description

Convenience object for HTTP requests.

Member Function Documentation

void DzHttpHelper::abort (  )  [virtual, slot]

Aborts the current request and deletes all scheduled requests

IDzHttpHandler * DzHttpHelper::cloneHandler (  )  [virtual, slot]
Returns:
a clone of this object

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::doAsynchronousRequest ( const QByteArray &  content = NULL  )  [virtual, slot]

Sends an asynchronous request to the server; this function returns immediately, it does not wait for a response.

See also:
received()

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

QByteArray DzHttpHelper::doSynchronousRequest ( const QByteArray &  content = NULL  )  [virtual, slot]

Sends a synchronous request to the server; this function waits for a response.

Returns:
A byte array consisting of the response content

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

QString DzHttpHelper::getError (  )  [virtual, slot]
Returns:
A human-readable description of the last error that occurred, or an empty string.

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::setConnectionMode ( const QString &  mode  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the HTTP connection mode used for connecting to the server. The supported modes are "http" and "https".

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::setContentType ( const QString &  type  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the value of the special HTTP header content-type field to type.

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::setHeaderValues ( const QStringList &  keys,
const QStringList &  values 
) [virtual, slot]
Parameters:
keys The keys in the http header.
values The values to be paired with the keys.
Attention:
Keys and Values must be the same length
void DzHttpHelper::setHost ( const QString &  host  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the HTTP server that is used for requests to host; i.e "search.daz3d.com"

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::setPath ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the path of the URL to path. The path is the part of the URL that comes after the host but before the query string.

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::setQueryString ( const QString &  query  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the query string of the URL to query.

Implements IDzHttpHandler.

void DzHttpHelper::setRequestMethod ( const QString &  method  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the HTTP request method which describes the requests action. The most common requests are "GET" and "POST".

Implements IDzHttpHandler.
